s0123: Therefore remonstrating persuaders cannot not examine the lord's loves and hates then persuade him.
s0124: The dragon as an insect, can be disturbed and familiarly ridden.
s0125: Yet its throat below has reverse scales one foot across, if a person touches them, then certainly kills the person.
s0126: The ruler also has reverse scales, persuaders who can avoid touching the ruler's reverse scales, then nearly succeed.
s0127: Someone transmitted his book to Qin.
s0128: Qin king saw Lonely Indignation, Five Parasites book, said: 'Alas, I could see this person and travel with him, die without regret!'
s0129: Li Si said: 'This is Han Fei's written book.'
s0131: Han king initially did not use Fei, when urgent, then sent Fei as envoy to Qin.
s0132: Qin king pleased with him, not yet employed.
s0133: Li Si, Yao Jia harmed him, slandered saying: 'Han Fei is Han's various princes.
s0134: Now king wishes to annex the feudal lords, Fei ultimately for Han not for Qin, this is human feeling.
s0135: Now king does not employ, long detain and return him, this leaves disaster for oneself, not as good as executing by false law.'
s0136: Qin king considered it so, sent officials to treat Fei.
s0137: Li Si sent men to give Fei medicine, made him commit suicide.
s0138: Han Fei wished to explain himself, could not be seen.
s0139: Qin king later regretted it, sent men to pardon him, Fei already dead.
s0140: Shen Zi, Han Zi both wrote books, transmitted to later generations, scholars have many.
s0141: I alone pity Han Zi wrote Difficulty of Persuasion yet could not save himself.
s0142: The Grand Historian says: Laozi valued the Dao, emptiness nothingness, responding to changes at non-action, therefore his book words speak of subtle mystery difficult to recognize.
s0143: Zhuangzi scattered morality and virtue, unrestrained discussions, in essentials also return to naturalness.
s0144: Shen Zi lowly and humble, applied to name and reality.
s0145: Han Zi drew ink lines, cut affairs, clarified right and wrong, his extreme harsh cruel lacking mercy.
s0146: All originated from morality and virtue's intent, yet Laozi profound and far-reaching.
